html:
12.16.20  12:31 pm   are you doing a video right now?

      yes

12.16.20  10:40 am   Do you like microtones? Have you ever considered to use them?

      all options are on the table

12.16.20  10:23 am   are lyrics poetry?

      sort of, but without the music it might be missing half of the poem

12.16.20  10:17 am   Why do words exist? 

      to mystify, and de-mystify things. words are essential for getting things to that exact level of mystification you crave

12.16.20  9:54 am   Where did you get your sense of humor from

      sometimes i make my own

12.16.20  9:37 am   What's a good way to stay motivated?

      what would you like to be motivated to do

12.16.20  9:14 am   12.14.20  12:26 pm You used...eight exclamation points...is there any significance to this?

      emphasis

12.16.20  9:09 am   so do you think painstakingly about the fills you're playing at the end of phrases on songs like I wanna be A movie star, outside, hello sexy pants?

      as with most things in music, it usually comes out better the less painstaking the thinking is

12.16.20  9:05 am   why are there so many mattress firm stores?

      because there are so many people who might want mattresses. At least, that is what the company banking on

12.16.20  8:02 am   Is making song hard?

      the hardest part is realizing how easy it is

12.16.20  5:06 am   Are you working on any new content for YouTube?

      flipping heck yea

12.16.20  4:23 am   what do i get for Christmas

      what are you going to get for the rest of time

12.16.20  2:40 am   Why is it so fun to just play keys on a keyboard? I got an old keyboard and I finally got it working and I am no joke just having the time of my life hitting the keys that make sound 

      this is one of the highlights of the brainular/conscious experience. making things happen. you are literally changing the world

12.16.20  1:25 am   Trying to get my hands to move independently more consistently as I learn piano, any wisdom you could share?

      no but it's going to happen anyway

12.15.20  11:24 pm   how do i rotate text on ms paint

      i don't know, but, if you can't do it, you could try rearranging the letters and changing the colors of some of them. to at least create somewhat of a psychological representation of rotation

12.15.20  11:15 pm   your music gets me so high. you are really good at your job, man. 

      holy reserve currency you are very friendly

12.15.20  11:13 pm   is there a reason for why you do things, like for example turning around the 3 first letters in 'questions' or do you just do them randomly because you're bored

      those are for the title pages of this website. i made the decision to use zero graphics for the website, to totally maximize speed. Also no fonts, to eliminate risk of fonts not being found. But, colors are allowed. So, with only colored text, how can i make some nice titles? it quickly occured to me that spelling variations becomes a very useful tool in this context, when combined with color variations

12.15.20  10:39 pm   What rhymes with purple?

      everything

12.15.20  8:55 pm   Was "Might Quit" you saying to your audience that you were quitting music?

      not even close. i've barely even gotten started

12.15.20  7:43 pm   people keep asking what i want for christmas and i don't have an answer, do you have any ideas?

      nevermind christmas, what do you want for the entire rest of time

12.15.20  7:12 pm   hey bill, you used to have a huge backlog of songs and stuff (that were incomplete) you did in the past and finished most things and refined everything to the point you posted stuff you only wanted to post but eventually got to the point where you stopped posting,

     that's not true, although i admit it sometimes appears that way

     did you run out of things to post?

     no. there is too much. and it has a tendency to suffocate me

     what was the reason you stopped posting?

     i did not, but i admit that sometimes it can appear that way, due to the extremely high intensity/quantity of the material, and its tendency to suffocate the production process

      why did you stop updating your reality page on your website?

     i did not, but, one of the reasons it can appear that way sometimes, is because i might be working on something for another page. or perhaps even working on things for that page, but the quantity intensity could be suffocating/congesting to the process

     seeing a journal of your life really inspired me, thank you bill, I would say I hope you find what you really want to do but I know you want to do music, but I'm not sure what you really really want to do with it (music) what is it you want to do with it?

     one of the best things to do with it is to put it out into the world so people can hear it. Another sneaky trick is to use music to enhance something else. which can also be put out into the world so peoeple can hear/see it

12.15.20  5:58 pm   Thoughts On Christmas?

      2 questions come to mind. how could something so lovely be so terrible and how could something terrible be so lovely

12.15.20  5:10 pm   Was the song might quit a joke

     no, it's a song

      or was it foreshadowing something?

     possibly foreshadowing me doing many more songs, and videos also

12.15.20  4:54 pm   Do songs inherently have meaning (at least intended meaning) or do we assign a meaning to them when we listen to them?

      a lot of both. and not just songs

12.15.20  3:54 pm   how do i stop hating the sound of my own voice?

      try finding some different ways to use it

12.15.20  2:44 pm   should i give up in trying to convey meaning in the way I want to convey meaning? 

      no

12.15.20  2:40 pm   what's the absolute best way to carry soup on long journeys?

      you can log into a cloud based soupshare service

12.15.20  2:33 pm   are you making a new song?

      yes but more songs after that

12.15.20  2:20 pm   what do you do in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

12.15.20  2:10 pm   what is going to happen to my consiousness

      what's happening to it now

12.15.20  2:10 pm   If you were able to take apart your atoms and put them back together simultaneously and that gives you the ability to go through things. What's the first thing you'd go through.

      one of the oceans

12.15.20  2:09 pm   How do i get better at learning songs on piano?

      put yourself in the songwriter's shoes by making up a song of your own

12.15.20  2:02 pm   how much did your experience making videos in 2d inform your learning process/style in 3d?

      fully, toadally,

12.15.20  1:34 pm   I will be at the airport terminal next week. Any advice?

      try not to......... breathe

12.15.20  1:03 pm   was it really raining when you made I'm crazy it's raining?

      no

12.15.20  12:40 pm   Since the world is flat, could someone in a space suit jump off the edge and go to space instead of using rockets to get to space?

      no

12.15.20  11:40 am   fractals trip the hell outta me, what do you think about em

      too small

12.15.20  11:27 am   Are there any conspiracies you believe in? Why or why not?

     reciting a song's lyrics, without the music. as a way to convince someone else the song is bad

12.15.20  9:59 am   how do i rhyme better

      don't think about rhymes. the best rhymes happen when you don't think about them. the worst ones happen when you think about it

12.15.20  9:24 am   How long is 10 minutes?

      .000019012852688 years

12.15.20  9:03 am   Why is Canada so darn clean?

      the snow cleans it off

12.15.20  7:28 am   What is an example of a superpower?

      waking up

12.15.20  5:46 am   will you ever (in the future) make a video in an aspect ratio other than 16:9?

      i think so

12.15.20  5:46 am   have you ever rode off into the sunset

      it's impossible to ride into the sunset. you will never reach the sun

12.15.20  3:55 am   why is your ask button in all caps

     i think it is normal for buttons to be in caps. such as ON, OFF, VAPOURIZE, etc

      isn't that illegal?

      no

12.15.20  2:50 am   opinion on vampires?

      very friendly

12.15.20  2:45 am   hey will you post a video on april 1

      maybe, but admittedly that's probably one of the least likely days for me to release something, just because there are so many other associations with that date. i tend to prefer dates which are more of a blank slate. actually i prefer to do things on a weekly basis

12.15.20  2:32 am   i wonder what you're thought process is 

      FLIPPING OUT

12.15.20  12:15 am   I find it amazing that so many people can ask you questions about the meaning of your music, which often has the answer of no. This is amazing because it means that people can find meaning in your music almost everywhere, even in places you didn't think of. It's just true artistic glory to have that effect on people. Any thoughts on the matter?

      meaning is everywhere, in infinite quantities. science tells us this

12.14.20  11:25 pm   Do you ever think your videos are "inspiring"?

      they are supposed to be. It is open for debate whether i have accomplished this yet
